docs.title: Welcome Verteilen Documentation
docs.text: Verteilen is a cluster computing application which provide friendly user interface to control with

docs.title: Application info
docs.text:
• Platform Support: Windows / Linux
  • Programming Language: Typescript
  • Framework: NodeJS, Electron, Vue, Vuetify
  • Script Language: JS
  • Author: Elly

docs.title: BackendType
docs.text: Express Server Type For checking the express server type This will only work in express mode

docs.title: NONE
docs.text: Unknown type backend, or there is no backend

docs.title: SERVER
docs.text: Compute server web backend

docs.title: CLUSTER
docs.text: Cluster web backend

docs.title: NODE
docs.text: Compute node web backend

docs.title: AppConfig
docs.text: Application Configuration Show current state of the app Defined by the backend proxy worker

docs.title: isExpress: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Express For browser check if it's connect to a express server

docs.title: isElectron: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Electron For browser check if it's use Electron desktop app currently

docs.title: isAdmin: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Admin If use express server, check user have root permission

docs.title: haveBackend: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Backend For browser check if it's connect to any server If false, it means it's a static website All the logic will run on browser

docs.title: login:boolean
docs.text: Login state For express mode detect only

docs.title: backendType: BackendType
docs.text: Server Type Detail check Here

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
User below commands to setup the project folder

git clone https://github.com/Verteilen/Verteilen.git
cd Verteilen
bun install
bun dev

After the build is setup, you can use below commands to do sort of things

docs.title: Quick Dev Actions
docs.text:
Open electron debug mode with Hot reload

npm run dev

Host static web

npm run web

docs.title: Project Structure
docs.text:
---
title: overview
---
graph LR
    A{verteilen_core} -->|dependency| B[Program]
    A -->|dependency| C[Compute Node]
    A -->|dependency| D[Web]
    A -->|dependency| E[Electron]
    A -->|dependency| F[Express]
    A -->|dependency| K[Cluster]
    B -->|build| G((EXE))
    D -->|build| H((HTML))
    E -->|build| I((msi, deb Files))
    F -->|build| J((NodeJS Files))
---
title: execute dependency
---
graph LR
    B((EXE))
    C[Compute Node]
    E[Electron]
    F[Express]

    B -.->|dependency| C
    B -.->|dependency| E
    B -.->|dependency| F

docs.title: Share
docs.text:
It's a codebase which share in different application

Source code location

It's locate at Verteilen-Core

"Update Share" Action

Which update the core library 

# It will print out the library version to console
npm i verteilen-core && cat package.json | grep core

docs.title: Worker
docs.text:
The executable program which run the task logic on it. This program is called by runner. In order to implement multithread logic in NodeJS environment

Source code location

It's locate at here

Build program

Use command below to package the program to executable file 

# Build exe depend on current os
npm run pkg
# Build worker.exe which run on windows
npm run pkg win
# Build worker.exe which run on mac
npm run pkg mac
# Build worker.exe which run on linux
npm run pkg linux
The output will locate at ./bin folder

docs.title: Static Web
docs.text:
Simple task management host by browser, which it close when user close browser It's unreliable you could said, But easy deploy

Notices:

  • Backend
  • Playground
  • Authentication

Source code location

It's locate at Verteilen Currently official Github page repository is Here

Build html

Use command below to use vite package the renderer to html files 

# Output html files
npm run build:web
The output will locate at ./build/renderer folder

docs.title: Electron Application
docs.text:
Notices:

  • Backend
  • Playground
  • Authentication

Source code path location

Frontend locate at src/renderer Backend locate at src/main

Build electron

Use command below to package the electron app to installation files 

# Build electron app depend on current os
npm run build
# Build electron app which run on windows (.msi)
npm run build:win
# Build electron app which run on mac
npm run build:mac
# Build electron app which run on linux (.deb)
npm run build:linux
The output will locate at ./dist folder

docs.title: Express Server
docs.text:
Notices:

  • Backend
  • Playground
  • Authentication

It's nodejs express server which hosting the backend

Source code path location

Frontend locate at src/renderer Backend locate at src/server

Build express

Use command below to package the express to nodejs deploy files 

# Output nodejs files
npm run build:server
The output will locate at ./build/server folder

docs.title: Compute Node
docs.text:
It's the client side application, it recevied server signal and do the calculation then return the info etc... It runs without user interface

Source code path location

It's locate at src/node

Build node

Use command below to package the express to nodejs deploy files 

# Output nodejs files
npm run build:node
The output will locate at ./build/node folder

docs.title: Console
docs.text: Project execution management page Submit your execution works here

docs.title: Core Concept
docs.text:
Let say for example, you have 5 power computers, And a project so big which require days to finish its works Such as 3D Rendering, or Video transcoding, or Large data sorting.

Sure, You can keep vertical scaling, until it's too expensive to do it. when you hit the critical point. You might considering horizontal scaling, which now you need a way to manage multiple computers

docs.title: Use Blender For Example
docs.text:
Let say there is a blender file needs to export to mp4 file, video length is near 1 hour and the scene contain VFX or fluid computing

In this case you can seperate the render to multiple fragment, 5 mins per .mp4 file In the end, you output folder will contain multiple videos

During the renderering, you can tell multiple computers to render different timespan Then combine them in the end

docs.title: Database
docs.text: A variables holder container, User can modify them during the compute stage as well.

docs.title: Views
docs.text:
The database page location

In this page, you can do everything in the action bar

  • Added database
  • Export database
  • Added Variable
  • etc...

docs.title: Add Database
docs.text:
Click top left corner for creating a new database

You must enter name to create You can also apply template for the database

Click the template in the group and hit confirm

The button text will change to current select template

docs.title: Select Database
docs.text: Click the database name for select another database

docs.title: Add Variable
docs.text:
Click top right corner for creating a new variable

You must enter name to create

You can select different datatype for the variable you are about to create

This is the special datatype, the detail is in the next section

docs.title: Expression
docs.text:
Checkout Expression for language details

Expression is execute during the compute stage, The value here is expression string, which is not the result yet In this case the expression will be 4 + 9999, then it will return 10003 and store in e1 variable container

docs.title: Example
docs.text: The purpose of this template is to show all the features this application support

docs.title: Static Web
docs.text:
Which you do not need to install anything, you can just click here to use it

No Advanced Features

Static Web mode means there is no backend attach to it It will only contain core feature

Browser Cannot Close

You cannot close browser, before your task finish All the compute node will disconnect, because all the websocket instance is hold in the browser code

docs.title: Compute Node Install
docs.text:
Install the nodejs module in the global for compute node 

# Install
npm install -g verteilen_node
# use command to start the client
verteilen_node

First time running

If you're running verteilen_node the first time It will trying to download the worker executable first

docs.title: Cluster Install
docs.text:
Install the nodejs module in the global for cluster 

# Install
npm install -g verteilen_cluster
# use command to start the cluster
verteilen_cluster

docs.title: Server Install
docs.text:
Install the nodejs module in the global for compute node 

# Install
npm install -g verteilen_server
# use command to start the server
verteilen_server

First time running

If you're running verteilen_server the first time It will trying to download the worker executable first

docs.title: Desktop App Install
docs.text:
In Release page

  • Windows user click .msi installation file
  • Linux user click .deb installation file

docs.title: Docker Deploy
docs.text:
Here is the quick deploy for compute node docker container

docker run --restart=always -p 12080:12080 --name verteilen_node0 e87870823/verteilen_node

Here is the quick deploy for compute server docker container

docker run --restart=always -p 11080:11080 -p 11777:11777 --name verteilen_server0 e87870823/verteilen_server

docs.title: Plugin
docs.text:
User-defined extra content

It could supported type of content below

  • Project Template
  • Database Template
  • Scripts
  • Executable Files

docs.title: Project
docs.text: A container which holds the information about the tasks schedule configuration

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
For manage the project, you want to enter the project page

In this page, you can do everything in the action bar

  • Added project
  • Export project
  • etc...

Click the UUID to quickly enter the task scheduler manage page

docs.title: Add New Project
docs.text:
Let's Trying to added a project

As you can see, you must enter the name, otherwise the menu will not accept

Next, We can choose template for the task schedule as well if you did not choose, this will create a blank project with 0 task in it

The template select menu here, you can open the group, choose the one

The template button will change the text to which one you select

You can choose the default binding parameter in here as well

After finish, you hit "create"

docs.title: Task
docs.text: A container with multiple jobs definition with flags which effect how node execute them

docs.title: Views
docs.text:
The task page location

In this page, you can do everything in the action bar

  • Added task
  • Export task
  • etc...

docs.title: Add New Task
docs.text:
Click button to add task

As you can see, you must enter the name, otherwise the menu will not accept

You can choose task execute mode by dropdown menu here

Or you can choose distribute, which let this be a cronjob type It will generate a number of subtask that use every nodes to finish it

Execute Order

No It does not have order like, first node run first job, second node run second job As long as the node finish the current subtask, it will fetch the next unfinish subtask It run as quickly as possible

With multicore checked, One node can have multiple subtask execute at the same time

Compute Heavy

If your task have cpu or gpu heavy compute task We recommand you not to check this It should be use on the lightweight task such as transcoding or formating json etc...

docs.title: Binding
docs.text:
It's a project binding database, It's just a default binding to a data vault You can actually leave this empty, You can assign it in the console page as well

  • Click green text to jump to database setting menu
  • Click dotted box to select other database

  • Click None to unbind
  • Click other to change binding

This is what you see when project is binding to nothing

docs.title: Workflow
docs.text:
This is the entire project content, which contain several layers

---
title: Overview
---
flowchart LR
    A[Project] -.->|1| B[Parameter]
    A -->|N| C[Task]
    C -->|N| D[Job]

docs.title: Project
docs.text: The project container, you can put name and description in here, just easy to manage.

docs.title: Task
docs.text:
This probably the most important part, defining tasks A project can have multiple task Every task can have different flags Currently Verteilen support 4 types of scenario

  • No Flags
  • Setup
  • Cluster
  • Multithread

No Flag Scenario

The backend will pick only one compute node, and run the task, then it will mark it as finish

---
title: scenario
---
flowchart LR
    Z[Task] --> Z0{No Flags}
    Z[Task] --> Z1{Setup}
    Z[Task] --> Z2{Cluster}
    Z[Task] --> Z3{Multithread}
    Z0 -->|Generate| A0[1 x Subtask]
    Z1 -->|Generate| A1[1 x Subtask]
    Z2 -->|Generate| A2[(N x Subtasks)]
    Z3 -->|Generate| A3[(N x Subtasks)]
    A0 --> B0(One Node Run Once)
    A1 --> B1(All Node Run Once)
    A2 --> B2(Run by Node Pool)
    A3 --> B3(Run by Node Pool <br />Run 2+ subtask at one node)

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
You want every compute node run once

Compute Node Offline Scenario

If one of the compute node is offline, backend will keep waiting for it to back online to do the task

docs.title: Cluster
docs.text: Base on the input number, it will create a queue, and run it one by one, until all the subtask finish Subtesk create base on the input number, if input is 5, then it will have 5 subtask create

docs.title: Multithread
docs.text:
Base on the input number, It will set the thread running upper-limit for a single compute node If the input is 4, and if cluster flag is on as well, then a single node can run 4 subtasks at once

This is useful for low compute task such as small file converting or apply metadata for a video file

docs.title: Job
docs.text:
The content of the task A task can have multiple jobs

By the way, Verteilen currently support use Javascript VM to write the logic here

docs.title: Expression
docs.text: Currently the properties is use Expression NPM package to do the work The point of the expression here is to get result base on different scenario

docs.title: Database
docs.text: The variables which use during the compute stage You can change the variable in the compute stage as well, it will make a copy to that stage. so it's fine

docs.title: 歡迎來到 Verteilen 文件指南
docs.text: Verteilen 使一套擁有親和使用者介面的分散運算軟體

docs.title: 應用程式資訊
docs.text:
• 平台支援: Windows / Linux
  • 程式語言: Typescript
  • 框架: NodeJS, Electron, Vue, Vuetify
  • 腳本語言: JS
  • 作者: Elly

docs.title: BackendType
docs.text: Express 伺服器類型 查看連結的伺服器類型 只在 Express 模式有效

docs.title: NONE
docs.text: 未知後端, 或是根本沒有後端

docs.title: SERVER
docs.text: 運算伺服器後端

docs.title: CLUSTER
docs.text: 節點中繼後端

docs.title: NODE
docs.text: 運算節點後端

docs.title: AppConfig
docs.text: 應用程式配置 顯示目前 App 的配置 透過後端定義 proxy 工作者

docs.title: isExpress: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Express 影響瀏覽器行爲, 查看是否使用 Express 作爲後端

docs.title: isElectron: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Electron 影響瀏覽器行爲, 查看是否使用 Electron 作爲後端

docs.title: isAdmin: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Admin 如果是運算伺服器, 查看用戶權限是否爲管理員

docs.title: haveBackend: boolean
docs.text: FLAG: Backend 影響瀏覽器行爲, 是否有後端 如果爲否, 代表現在是靜態伺服器 所有邏輯將在瀏覽器上執行

docs.title: login:boolean
docs.text: 登入狀態 給 Express 伺服器模式偵測狀態

docs.title: backendType: BackendType
docs.text: 伺服器類型 詳細查看 這裡

docs.title: 設置
docs.text:
使用以下指令來設置專案資料夾

git clone https://github.com/Verteilen/Verteilen.git
cd Verteilen
bun install
bun dev

設置完成後可以用以下指令做各種動作

docs.title: 快速執行動作
docs.text:
執行 Electron 開發人員模式

npm run dev

設置靜態網頁

npm run web

docs.title: 專案結構
docs.text:
---
title: 大綱
---
graph LR
    A{verteilen_core} -->|依賴於| B[Program]
    A -->|依賴於| C[Compute Node]
    A -->|依賴於| D[Web]
    A -->|依賴於| E[Electron]
    A -->|依賴於| F[Express]
    A -->|依賴於| K[Cluster]
    B -->|建置| G((EXE))
    D -->|建置| H((HTML))
    E -->|建置| I((msi, deb Files))
    F -->|建置| J((NodeJS Files))
---
title: 執行依賴
---
graph LR
    B((EXE))
    C[Compute Node]
    E[Electron]
    F[Express]

    B -.->|依賴於| C
    B -.->|依賴於| E
    B -.->|依賴於| F

docs.title: 共享
docs.text:
共享到名個專案的腳本

原始碼連結

連結附上於 Verteilen-Core

"更新" 動作

更新核心庫 

# 會將下載的核心庫版本打印出來
npm i verteilen-core && cat package.json | grep core

docs.title: 工作者
docs.text:
這個執行檔將會用於流程的運算 透過執行者呼叫, 生成 Thread 實體, 爲了在 NodeJS 環境實現多核心

原始碼連結

連結附上於 here

建置程式

用以下指令進行打包 

# 根據目前作業系統打包
npm run pkg
# 打包 Window 平台用執行檔
npm run pkg win
# 打包 MacOS 平台用執行檔
npm run pkg mac
# 打包 Linux 平台用執行檔
npm run pkg linux
輸出會在 ./bin 資料夾

docs.title: 靜態網頁
docs.text:
Simple task management host by browser, which it close when user close browser It's unreliable you could said, But easy deploy

Notices:

  • Backend
  • Playground
  • Authentication

Source code location

It's locate at Verteilen Currently official Github page repository is Here

Build html

Use command below to use vite package the renderer to html files 

# Output html files
npm run build:web
The output will locate at ./build/renderer folder

docs.title: 核心概念
docs.text:
假設你有 5 台強算力的電腦, 而你手上有運算作業是需要巨大算力 像是 3D 算圖, 或是影片轉碼, 或是巨大數據庫的編排

你可以繼續垂直擴展, 直到太過於昂貴之前 你也許有想過要水平擴展, 但現在你需要一個工具去管理多台電腦

docs.title: 用 Blender 作爲範例
docs.text:
假設有個 blender 檔案需要輸出 mp4 影片檔案, 影片將近 1 個小時, 而且包含複雜的特效或是液體模擬運算

在這個情況, 你可以將工作分爲碎片, 每 5 分鐘輸出一個 mp4 影片檔案 在算完時, 你的結果資料夾會有很多個 mp4 影片檔案

在算圖的過程中, 你可以同時叫不同電腦算不同的時間段 在結尾的時侯, 再把所有影片接在一起

docs.title: 資料庫
docs.text: 參數的持有容器, 用戶也可以在執行階段進行更新

docs.title: 介面
docs.text:
資料庫頁面位置

在這個頁面, 你可以透過工具列完成所有動作

  • 新增資料庫
  • 匯出資料庫
  • 新增參數
  • 其他...

docs.title: 新增資料庫
docs.text:
點擊左上角新增資料庫

必須輸入名稱 你也可以套用樣板來建立資料庫

點選群組裡面你要的樣板, 然後按確定

按鈕文字會變成你選擇的樣板

docs.title: 選擇資料庫
docs.text: 典籍資料庫名稱選擇其他資料庫

docs.title: 新增參數
docs.text:
點擊左上角新增參數

必須輸入名稱

你可以選擇其他資料形態

這是特殊的資料形態, 下一區會詳細介紹

docs.title: 表達式
docs.text:
細節請看 表達式

表達式將會在運算階段使用, 你看到以下的參數是表達式的數值, 並非結果 以這個範例將會是 4 + 9999, 回傳 10003 並且保存在 e1 的參數容器中

docs.title: 靜態網頁
docs.text:
你不需要安裝任何東西, 你可以按 這裡 直接使用

沒有進階功能

靜態網頁等於沒有後台 這會侷限於只有核心的功能而已

瀏覽器不能關

在運算結束前, 你不能關閉瀏覽器 否則所有的節點會離線, 因爲瀏覽器持有所有你本地的 Websocket 連線

docs.title: 運算節點安裝
docs.text:
安裝 nodejs 全局插件來使用運算節點 

# 安裝
npm install -g verteilen_node
# 這指令來執行運算節點
verteilen_node

第一次運作

如果你是第一次執行節點 你會先下載執行的元件

docs.title: 中繼節點安裝
docs.text:
安裝 nodejs 全局插件來使用中繼節點 

# 安裝
npm install -g verteilen_cluster
# 這指令來執行中繼節點
verteilen_cluster

docs.title: 伺服器安裝
docs.text:
安裝 nodejs 全局插件來使用伺服器 

# 安裝
npm install -g verteilen_server
# 這指令來執行伺服器
verteilen_server

第一次運作

如果你是第一次執行伺服器 你會先下載執行的元件

docs.title: 桌面應用程式安裝
docs.text:
在 釋出版本 頁面

  • Windows 用戶 點擊 .msi 安裝檔
  • Linux 用戶 點擊 .deb 安裝檔

docs.title: Docker 部署
docs.text:
快速部署運算節點 Docker

docker run --restart=always -p 12080:12080 --name verteilen_node0 e87870823/verteilen_node

快速部署伺服器 Docker

docker run --restart=always -p 11080:11080 -p 11777:11777 --name verteilen_server0 e87870823/verteilen_server

docs.title: 插件
docs.text:
用戶自定義額外內容

可以支援以下

  • 專案樣板
  • 資料庫樣板
  • 腳本
  • 執行檔案

docs.title: 專案
docs.text: 一個擁有所有運算資訊的容器

docs.title: 大綱
docs.text:
爲了管理專案, 前往專案頁面

在這個頁面, 你可以透過工具列完成所有動作

  • 新增專案
  • 匯出專案
  • 其他...

你可以按 UUID 快速進入流程管理頁面

docs.title: 新增專案
docs.text:
讓我們嘗試新增專案

你必須輸入名稱, 否則不會接受

接下來, 我們可以選擇流程清單樣板 如果你沒有選擇, 將會新增空白專案容器

這是樣板選擇清單, 你可以打開群組然後選擇你要的

樣板區文字會顯示你選擇的樣板

你也可以在這裡選擇綁定資料庫

完成後按 "建立"

docs.title: 流程
docs.text: 一個擁有多個任務的容器, 還有會影響執行階段的配置項目

docs.title: 介面
docs.text:
流程介面的位置

在這個頁面, 你可以透過工具列完成所有動作

  • 新增流程
  • 匯出流程
  • 其他...

docs.title: 新增流程
docs.text:
按下新增按鈕 新增流程

你必須輸入名稱, 否則不會接受

你可以選擇流程的執行模式, 透過下拉式選單選取

你可以選擇分散運算模式 執行階段會生成多個子流程

執行順序

執行的節點並沒有任何順序可言 任何節點只要完成任務, 就會去找下一個子流程執行

多核心模式, 單一節點可以同時跑多個子流程

高需求算力任務

如果你的流程內容含有 cpu 或是 gpu 高算力需求 推薦你使用分散運算, 不要使用多核心

docs.title: 綁定
docs.text:
專案綁定的資料庫, 方便於執行階段建立 你可以留空, 執行階段再選擇資料庫

  • 按左側進入資料庫頁面
  • 按選擇, 選擇其他資料庫綁定

  • 按 None 取消綁定
  • 按其他資料庫綁定

如果你專案沒有綁定, 看起來會是像這樣子

docs.title: 運作流程
docs.text:
這是專案的內容, 分爲好幾層

---
title: 專案結構
---
flowchart LR
    A[專案] -.->|1| B[資料庫]
    A -->|N| C[流程]
    C -->|N| D[工作]

docs.title: 專案
docs.text: 專案容器, 你可以給予名稱跟敘述, 方便管理的資料結構

docs.title: 流程
docs.text:
這大概是最重要的部分, 定義流程 專案可以有多個流程 每個流程可以有不同的設定 目前支援 4 種設定

  • 預設
  • 設置型
  • 分散運算
  • 多核運算

預設場景

後台會挑一台節點跑一次流程, 然後直接標記爲完成

---
title: 場景
---
flowchart LR
    Z[流程] --> Z0{預設}
    Z[流程] --> Z1{設置型}
    Z[流程] --> Z2{分散運算}
    Z[流程] --> Z3{多核運算}
    Z0 -->|生成| A0[1 x 子流程]
    Z1 -->|生成| A1[1 x 子流程]
    Z2 -->|生成| A2[(N x 子流程)]
    Z3 -->|生成| A3[(N x 子流程)]
    A0 --> B0(單一節點跑一次)
    A1 --> B1(多個節點跑一次)
    A2 --> B2(透用節點池運算)
    A3 --> B3(透用節點池運算 <br />一個節點可同時跑 2+ 子流程)

docs.title: 設置型
docs.text:
你想要所有節點跑一次流程

節點離線狀況

如果一個節點處於離線狀態, 後台將會一直等待重新連線, 直到拿到任務回傳

docs.title: 分散運算
docs.text: 根據輸入的數字參數, 後台會建立清單, 一個一個運算直到全部跑完 子流程會根據輸入的數字參數建立, 如果輸入的數字是 5, 那將會有 5 個子流程產生

docs.title: 多核運算
docs.text:
根據輸入的數字參數, 運算單元會設置最高単一節點可以程載的任務上限 如果輸入的數字是 4, 而且分散運算也打開, 那麼單一節點會同時被派送 4 個任務

這個選項對於低算力需求的工作很有幫助, 像是賦予影片 metadata

docs.title: 工作
docs.text:
流程的內容 流程下可以有多個工作任務

順帶一提, Verteilen 目前支援 Javascript 腳本的邏輯編寫

docs.title: 表達式
docs.text: 目前屬性使用了 表達式 NPM 插件進行運算 重點是讓不同的情況能得到不同的結果

docs.title: 資料庫
docs.text: 用於運算流程的數據庫 你也可以在運算期間變更數據內容, 後台會建立一個副本, 所以不會影響到
